mapper.update: UPDATE job SET transaction_id = #{transaction_id},out_trade_no=#{out_trade_no},version = version+1,state = 1 WHERE id = #{id} AND version = 0
mapper.select: SELECT a.id,a.userId,a.totalAward,a.award,a.alreadyAward,a.totalCount,a.alreadyCount,a.context, DATE_FORMAT(a.createTime,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s")AS createTime,a.state,a.headPic, a.title,a.userName,a.skipAppid,a.skipUrl,a.shareUrl,a.`version`,a.wxchat_mark,a.pre_image,a.tweet,a.tweet_title, a.job_type,a.one_award,b.nickName,b.avatarUrl FROM job a LEFT JOIN admin b ON a.userId = b.userId WHERE id = #{id} AND state != 0 AND a.totalAward > a.award

SELECT a.id,a.userId,a.totalAward,a.award,a.alreadyAward,a.totalCount,a.alreadyCount,a.context, DATE_FORMAT(a.createTime,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s")AS createTime,a.state,a.headPic, a.title,a.userName,a.skipAppid,a.skipUrl,a.shareUrl,a.transaction_id FROM job a WHERE id = #{id} AND state = 0 AND version = 0

SELECT a.id, a.userId, a.totalAward, a.award, a.alreadyAward, a.totalCount, a.alreadyCount, a.context, DATE_FORMAT( a.createTime, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s" ) AS createTime, TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND,createTime,NOW()) AS timeLimit, a.state, a.headPic, a.title, a.userName, a.skipAppid, a.skipUrl, a.shareUrl, a.transaction_id FROM job a WHERE id = #{id} AND state IN (1,4) AND a.totalAward > a.award
mapper.update: UPDATE job SET alreadyAward = alreadyAward + #{award},alreadyCount = alreadyCount +1,VERSION = VERSION + 1 WHERE id = #{id} AND state != 0 AND VERSION = #{version} AND totalCount > alreadyCount

SELECT IF(a.totalCount IS NULL,0,a.totalCount) AS totalCount,IF(b.totalAward IS NULL,0,b.totalAward) AS totalAward FROM
(SELECT COUNT(1) AS totalCount FROM job WHERE userId = #{userId} AND state!=0) a, (SELECT SUM(award) AS totalAward FROM job WHERE userId = #{userId} AND state !=0) b

SELECT id,userId,totalAward,award,alreadyAward,totalCount,alreadyCount,context,timeLimit,DATE_FORMAT(createTime,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s")AS createTime, state,transaction_id FROM job WHERE timeLimit*24*60-1-TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE,createTime,NOW()) < 0 AND state = 1 AND timeLimit != 0
